description: XRP CLASSIC presents a decentralized accessible blockchain and cryptocurrency infrastructure; it is absolutely open source content management system. XRP CLASSIC is promoting a smart contract platform, the main goal of which is to provide the most progressive properties no other platform is able to offer right now. The main feature of it is that it is the only one developed out of a scientific doctrine and a methodology putting research at the first place. A huge international team of highly-qualified engineers and scientists makes the core of the XRP CLASSIC development process.
name: XRP Classic
